com.moomoohk.MooBootstrap

Class Bootstrap

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.moomoohk.MooBootstrap.Bootstrap

  • public class Bootstrap
extends java.lang.Object
    Bootstrap utility meant to aid in update checking and updating of files.
    Since:
    Dec 24, 2013
    Author:
    Meshulam Silk (moomoohk@ymail.com)

      • check

        public boolean check(int localBuildNumber)
              throws org.xml.sax.SAXException,
                     java.io.IOException,
                     javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException
        Checks for an update.

        Compares the version of the local file with the remote version (in changelog.xml).

        Parameters:
        localBuildNumber - Local build number
        Returns:
        True if update is needed, else false
        Throws:
        javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException
        java.io.IOException
        org.xml.sax.SAXException
